turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Invisible Life.
turn.2: Invisible Life Invisible Life is a novel by American author E. Lynn Harris self-published in 1991, before being taken up by Anchor Books in 1994. The plot follows an African American man's journey of sexual discovery, in which he realizes he is a homosexual.
turn.4: In 2010, the "Los Angeles Times" listed the novel as one of the top 20 "classic works of gay literature" ever written.
turn.6: Raymond Winston Tyler Jr, is a sexy green eyed black man in a white dominated workplace.
turn.8: As a lawyer he knows the good things in life, but what obstacles did it take to get there.
turn.12: The story starts in the 1980s: he's in his senior year at the University of Alabama, he has the perfect life.
